data.title: DE ZEEUW, Maxime
data.text:
Career / Clubs: grew up with Eclair BC and Excelsior Bruxelles; made his debut with Excelsior Brussels (D3) during the 2004-2005 season; played the 2005-2006 season with BC Verviers Pepinster; stay there ‘till the 2009-2010 season; signed in October 2010 with Optima Gent; signed wih VOO Verviers Pepinster for the 2011-2012 season; signed for two seasons (2012 -2014) with Port Antwerp Giants; signed its first contract abroad with Virtus Roma (2014-2015); signed with CEZ Nymburk for the 2015-2016 season

Awards: won the 2014 Belgian Player of the Year Award ; won the 2009 Belgian Most Promising Player of the Year Award; has been member of the Belgian U-16, U-18 and U-20 National Team

Career /Belgian Lions: 94 caps

Miscellaneous: play its 1st E.K. Qualif. Game on September 17th 2008: Turkey – Belgium: 80-64;Best performance: 20pts (2012, at Albania) 12rebs (2011, vs Russia); 3ass (three times)1Double double(2012, at Albania 20pts-10reb) Best performance during Euro 2011-2013-2015 : 14pts (vs Israël, 2013); 12reb (vs Russia, 2011); 4ass (vs Ukraine,2015)

Average Stats during E.K. Qualif.Games / 10 games (+ 5 DNP) 16’10” 7.6pts 4.7reb 0,9ass
